name: Progress Circle Group

components.name: Inner Progress Circle

geometry.notes: Calculated as width/2; perfect circle (w === h)

stroke.notes: Ellipse node does not expose stroke properties via MCP get_metadata; requires get_code or manual inspection

components.notes: Likely represents the background track circle; full styling requires Figma REST API or Dev Mode inspection

components.name: Outer Progress Ellipse

geometry.notes: Instance node; elliptical shape (h > w); likely animated progress arc

stroke.notes: Instance nodes do not expose stroke properties via MCP; parent component definition required

arc.notes: Arc angles not exposed via MCP API; requires vector network or component properties

components.notes: Instance of component; actual stroke/arc data in parent component definition

limitations: MCP get_metadata returns only geometric bounds for ellipse/vector nodes
Stroke properties (width, cap, join, color, dasharray) require Figma REST API (/files/:key/nodes?ids=...) or manual Dev Mode inspection
Arc angles for progress ring require vector network data (not exposed via MCP)
Instance nodes (68426:7286) reference component definitions not returned by MCP tools
recommendation:
Use Figma REST API GET /v1/files/:file_key/nodes?ids=68426:7285,68426:7286 to retrieve:
- strokes array (strokeWeight, strokeAlign, strokeCap, strokeJoin)
- fills array
- arcData (if vector with arc)
- Component definition for instance 68426:7286
